name: radiance
content:
radiance noun [U]
(HAPPINESS/BEAUTY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
happiness, beauty, or good health that you can see in someone's face: He was struck by the radiance of her smile. The radiancy of the composition shone through, and the players were rewarded with a standing ovation.

radiance noun [U]
(LIGHT/HEAT)
light or heat that comes from something: We basked in the radiance of the African sun. The radiancy of the golden sunshine dazzled their eyes.
